title: What are the best books to learn about semiconductor fundamentals and devices? - Quora

response.answer_text: The classic is Sze’s book “Physics of Semiconductor Devices” (Simon M. Sze, Kwok K. Ng: 9780471143239: Amazon.com: Books) now in its 3rd edition (with K. Kwok). Former editions were also very valuable (I have a copy of the 1st edition). HTH
